description: Version Control: Git (committing, pushing, pulling, creating requests, and team collaboration).
Programming Basics: Variables, loops, methods, constructors, lists, dates, exceptions, collections, and annotations.
Object-Oriented Programming (OOP): Inheritance, composition, polymorphism, encapsulation, abstraction, interfaces, enumerations, and object manipulation.
REST API & JSON: Understanding and working with APIs and data exchange formats.
Spring Boot & Security: Application development with Spring Boot, security concepts, and Thymeleaf for templating.
Frontend Development: HTML, CSS, Vue.js (including Axios), and basic Node.js concepts.
Installation and configuration of computers, networks.
Web sites building and multimedia applications.

diploma: Support of operating systems and networks.
description: Installations of operating systems and programs.
